mdRecord.dcterms:description: The building was completed in 1774 as a private town house for Sir Lawrence Dundas by the architect Sir William Chambers. Today it is the registered office of the Royal Bank of Scotland ... and is protected as a category A listed building. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dundas_House [work]
